channel.title: Resumable scripts in C# (x-post from General Server Discussion)
channel.description:
Here's the original topic: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,674073.0.html
I've cross-posted this here as well because there has been, and still is, a lot of RSC community interest in easy-to-write resumable game content scripts. Scripts that don't result in continuation-hell and/or blocking of thread.
----
Thoughts?
